requirement_text: We need an option for users to easily reset forgotten passwords, possibly through a security question or email verification.

user_stories.user_story: As a registered user, I want to be able to reset my forgotten password using either a security question or email verification, so that I can regain access to my account when I forget my password.

requirement_text: The app should support gestures for navigation to make it easier and more intuitive to use on touchscreen devices.

user_stories.user_story: As a mobile app user, I want to be able to navigate through the app using gestures, so that I can easily and intuitively interact with the app on touchscreen devices.
